amendment.description: Amendment expands pre-clearance border crossing programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in part B of House Report 109-84 to improve pre-clearance border crossing programs, including NEXUS, FAST, and SENTRI. Authorizes the creation of four U.S. enrollment centers and customer service number, merges the requirements of the NEXUS air and land cards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
